Newsvine invites

You’ve heard the hype, and read the reviews, so now you want in, eh? Well Newsvine is (probably) a few weeks away from opening the doors to the public, but in the meantime I’ve got some invitations to give out. So, if you’re a reader of Geek & Mild and want to check out what’s behind the login screen, let me know.

Leave a comment (with your email address) or drop me a line directly.
